shortDescription: {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have been hitting {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} bases the past few days. All signs point to this base being next. We've been asked to defend the base long enough to evacuate its occupants.

dialogueContent.words: We underestimated the enemy numbers heading our way.  Evacuations are in progress, but it'll take time.  We need you to stall the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces while we get people onto the transport line.
The base defenses aren't impressive, but they're better than nothing.
That takes care of it, COmmander.  Sadly, we have limited time to recover any salvages beofre the hostile main forces arrive.
I don't know what to say.
First set of convoys is ready to move out.
Last batch of evacuees, keep them protected.
Forget the base, it's toast.  Protect the convoy instead.
Hostiles' are trying to hit us from the sides --- cover the convoy now, Commander!
Convoy 04's out of the danger zone
We've marked your evac zone.  Reach it as soon as possible.
Great job, Commander!  All hostiles in the area are down.  We should be able to get out before more enemy reinforcements show up.
